Boost Your Productivity with Task Express

Task Express seamlessly integrates Google Tasks into your browsing experience, allowing you to quickly create and manage tasks without leaving your current session.

Key Features:
- Quick Task Creation: Create tasks with a title and notes using the extension popup.
- Contextual Tasks: Right-click to turn selected text into a task or use the webpage title and URL.
- Easy Updates: Refresh your Google Task lists from the popup or right-click menu.
